string-array.name: diet_tips
string-array.item: that drinking green tea regularly can boost metabolism and aid in weight loss due to its high concentration of catechins?
that certain spices like turmeric and cinnamon have anti-inflammatory properties and can support healthy digestion when incorporated into your diet?
that consuming omega-3 fatty acids, found in foods like salmon and walnuts, can help lower the risk of heart disease and improve brain health?
that dark chocolate with a high percentage of cocoa (70% or more) contains antioxidants and may have positive effects on heart health when consumed in moderation?
that probiotics, commonly found in yogurt and fermented foods, can promote a healthy gut microbiome and support digestive health?
that avocados are a good source of healthy fats and contain fiber, which can help regulate cholesterol levels and keep you feeling full for longer?
that berries, such as blueberries and strawberries, are packed with antioxidants that can protect against cell damage and help improve memory and cognitive function?
that cruciferous vegetables like broccoli, cabbage, and cauliflower are rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber, and may have cancer-fighting properties?
that incorporating legumes like lentils, chickpeas, and black beans into your diet can provide a good source of plant-based protein, fiber, and nutrients?
that drinking an adequate amount of water can improve metabolism, aid in digestion, and help maintain healthy skin?

resources.string: Already have an account? Log in.
What do you want to eat today?
Start your morning with a healthy and nutritious breakfast!
Time for lunch! Diet doesn\'t mean you have to endure hunger, you know!
A healthy and nutritious dinner can help you sleep better!
It\'s the late afternoon! Healthy snacks can help you stay focused!
Session has expired, please log back in
Are you sure you want to exit this application?
It seems that your daily calorie needs are sufficient. These foods will make you overweight!
The number of servings cannot be 0
Diet!n will help you achieve the healthy lifestyle you want.
Before starting, Diet!n needs some data first to get to know you better!
Do you want to gain, lose or maintain your weight?
You want to lose weight, for example because you feel too fat or want to be healthier.
You want to keep your weight in order to remain ideal.
You want to gain weight, for example because you feel too thin or you want to be healthier.
How often do you do activities every day?
You rarely do activities, such as just sitting or lying down. For example, you just sit in front of the computer or TV, or just lie in bed.
You do little activity, such as walking or standing. For example, you take a walk at home or at work. You exercise approximately 1–3 days a week.
Most of your daily time is used for activities. You exercise about 3–5 days a week.
You routinely do physical activity every day on a light–moderate scale, such as exercising 6–7 days a week.
You are very active, like exercising every day on a weight scale. For example, you exercise 2 times a day.
The last step! We need your data so that all calculations can be done correctly!
Height and weight are needed to be able to count calories correctly. If there are changes, they can be edited in the profile menu!
Age is also needed to be able to count calories correctly.
How much weight do you expect by using this application?
After you click continue, the data entered will be saved.
Please check again all the data that has been filled in before pressing the continue button!
Sorry, you can\'t use this app if you\'re under 17 years old.
The expected weight must be less than the current weight
The expected weight must be greater than the present weight
Your healthy life has started now!
The dishes you love, served in one place!

+ 10000+ recipes
+ Location based recipes
+ Protein Summary
+ Fat Summary
Use the button below if you want to update other data, such as:
Goal, activity level, weight, height, age, gender.
Fill in your personal data again
